data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Monagas will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Monagas, Venezuela
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Monagas an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 8 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Monagas, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Monagas, Venezuela.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Monagas, Venezuela.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Monagas, Venezuela.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Monagas who will make disciples who make disciples.

location.name: Monagas
location.cities_list: Maturín, Tucupita, Punta de Mata, Caripito, Temblador
location.cities_list_w_pop: Maturín (529,376), Tucupita (99,778), Punta de Mata (61,080), Caripito (43,448), Temblador (36,447)
